title: AGI Execution Intent Schema
description: Defines the required structure for formal operational Intents generated or consumed by the AGI system, strictly defining component invocation.

intent_id.description: Unique identifier for this specific intent iteration, linking to execution traces.

timestamp.description: Time of intent generation or last modification.

source_module.description: The module or agent that proposed this intent (e.g., 'PlanningEngine', 'UserInterface').

objective.description: A high-level natural language description of the goal/mandate.

action.description: Formal definition of the strongly typed action to be executed.

component_path.description: The absolute path or alias for the target system component (e.g., 'Evo/CodebaseManager', 'Data/DB_Access').

function_name.description: The specific function or method to invoke on the component.

parameters.description: Key-value pairs corresponding to the function arguments. Must adhere to component signature.

expected_output_schema.description: Optional JSON Schema defining the structure of the successful execution result for validation.

governance_tags.description: Tags used for operational policy filtering, sandboxing, and auditing.

PriorityLevel.description: Defines the urgency and allocation weight for scheduling.
